feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Move away from anonymous functions for middleware by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16622
  • Remove icons from workspace apps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16623
  • Navigation from workspace app by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16611
  • Serialize the upload and download of directories to S3. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16624
  • Return doc on db.put by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16625
  • Use bounded concurrency for retrieveDirectory by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16628
  • Bump export concurrency to 5 and make sure export modal shows loading state. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16630
  • Add workspace app disabling and updating status API by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16621

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.24...3.13.25

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.26
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Navigation from workspace app" by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16634

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.25...3.13.26

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • remove tenants check from Budibase platform. by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16635

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.26...3.13.27

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make sure tooltip position is at the bottom for banners by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16641
  • App level Recaptcha V2 support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16583
  • Improve put retrievedoc typing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16643
  • disabled prop should override warning by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16655
  • Allow the user to see the install info by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16656

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.27...3.13.28

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.29
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BUDI-9399] Fixes columnar layout for Checkboxes in Form Blocks by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16659
  • Skip migrations doc on replication by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16663

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.28...3.13.29
